Articles.Content:
If been getting the same exception while trying to launch a large MK3 based base-lander. The details are as follows.

Exception Type:        EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Exception Codes:       KERN_PROTECTION_FAILURE at 0x00000000bf7ffffc

I'm on a MacBook Pro, running OS 10.10.5


Is there a fix available for this? I'm using Mechjeb2, and I think I'm fully updated.

Edited December 5, 2015 by Zosma Procyon
